alert.note: Alert for Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 5:24PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN BEAUREGARD PARISH...SOUTHWESTERN NEWTON AND SOUTHEASTERN JASPER COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CST... At 523 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wrights Settlement, or near Buna, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kirbyville, Call, Fields, Buna, Wrights Settlement, Devils Pocket, Trout Creek, Bancroft, Old Salem, and Bleakwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
